features: PROFESSIONAL CHEF’S KNIFE: This chef’s knife can be used to cut breads, fruits, vegetables, meat or fillet. The exceptional quality and performance make it suitable to use for home and professional use. Cutting like a master chef will increase your satisfaction and enjoyment while working in the kitchen.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL KNIFE: The professional kitchen knife can be used to cut, slice, dice, mince and chop several varieties of vegetables, bakery items and different types of meat. It is truly a multipurpose tool.

ULTRA-SHARP EDGE: Sharpness of a chopping knife is essential for achieving cleaner and precise cuts. This 2.5mm thick razor-sharp stainless steel blade is ideal for effortlessly cutting and does it well. The blade has been hand polished by experienced craftsman to ensure long-lasting sharpness

ERGONOMICALLY SHAPED HANDLE: The blade of this vegetable chef knife is forged in a soft and comfortable handle to offer the perfect grip and optimum control. The ergonomically shape strikes the right balance between handle and thin blade, ensuring ease of movement.

ATTRACTIVE LOOK: The blade which is made of high quality stainless steel that has pattern is particularly striking, sleek and elegant. Super sharp chefs knife has a beautiful Damascus design on it (just Damascus design BUT not real Damascus). Don’t worry about your money, because we offer a lifetime guarantee and easy return policy.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Orblue kitchen knife is a must-have kitchen tool for every chef, culinary expert and cooking enthusiast. This little helper will be one of your reasons to love cooking. This cooking knife is carefully engineered and manufactured to make sure they last through the test of time. It has the craftsmanship you can trust and sharpness you can feel.

Ultra-sharp & Precision Crafted! Ideal cooking knife for chopping, mincing, slicing, crushing, boning & carving a variety of vegetables, meat & nuts. The handle features a comfortable, ergonomic, no-slip grip for optimal comfort and safety.
Kitchen Essential and Multifunctional Knife! Chosen by home cooks and professional chefs. Slice, dice, mince and chop several varieties of vegetables, bakery items and different types of meat.
Mix of quality, design and materials! Classic cooking knife never gets out of style and season. The design and function is a classic combination of elegance, longevity and efficiency.

Stylish-looking Kitchen Knife It features a sleek, elegant design and the ideal blade-to-handle weight ratio, for effortless use. The blade which is made of high quality stainless steel that has pattern is particularly striking, sleek and elegant. Super sharp chefs knife has a beautiful Damascus design on it (just Damascus design BUT not real Damascus).

Ergonomically Shaped Handle The comfortable handle of this vegetable knife offers the perfect grip and optimum control. The ergonomically shape strikes the right balance between handle and thin blade, ensuring ease of movement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars On Par with Wusthof, Fraction of the Cost
reviews.reviewText: I own a lot of different types of knives and different brands. I'm not a professional chef by any means, just your average home cook, cooking about 7 meals a week and very rarely some type of sweet baked goods. My go-to knives are usually my Wusthof 6" chef's knife and my KitchenAid 7" santoku knife. In my never-ending quest of searching for better cooking tools, I came across this Orblue knife. I purchased the 8" cooking knife, which is the longest blade I've owned so far. I wasn't really expecting much for a cheap knife $23 knife, anticipating it to be decent like my KitchenAid santoku blade which was similarly $20 in price. I was impressed with how it was packaged and the overall quality. If this was given as a gift, you could have fooled me into thinking this was a $70+ knife. The weight of it is heavier than I expected, definitely heavier than a Wusthof knife, but I prefer heavier knives over lighter. The blade is extremely sharp, well-crafted with a real wooden handle and a stamped metal base. The woodgrain pattern is seemingly etched but in a way that there are no grooves to potentially catch onto ingredients you're chopping. The blade is fantastic, on par with my Wusthof knife, back in its glory days of new, before I let the blade dull and haven't gotten it professionally resharpened yet. It's powerful enough to cut through large sweet potatoes and delicate enough to slice a Roma tomato without completely squishing it. It can mince garlic and fresh herbs like sage and cilantro finer and faster than my other blades. It's also great for carving roast chicken and chopping or filleting raw meat, it's even great for cleaning fish. It's a truly versatile knife. Like other thicker-bladed knives, it's not ideal for chopping butternut squash or melons with tough skin - a cleaver is what you need for those. But for your assorted everyday ingredients, this knife is great! It's my #1 knife in the drawer and my go-to for cooking now. The reviews for the knives seem to include the other varieties, which I read a lot of sarcastic reviews for the bread knife. Ignore those and definitely go with the 8" cooking knife! I'm definitely buying another one for my sister for her birthday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best knife I could buy!
reviews.reviewText: This product is literally the best return of investment I have ever had, for 20 bucks you have a razor sharp, beautiful knife. The sharpness can last up to 2-3 weeks, which for a cheap knife is very very high quality overall worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So far it feels like exactly what I paid for. Will it get dull soon? Probably. Is it cheap and sharp and decent quality? Yes.

reviews.reviewText: Mantiene su filó a pesar de todo lo que he usado

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Wow, very impressed with this knife. I loved the look of this knife and the design on the blade so we thought we would try it out. We were very pleasantly surprised by the nice packaging and the feel and quality of the knife. Nicely balanced and very sharp. Also, a great deal for the price. It is working just as well and looks just as nice as our other knives that we spent a lot more on. Overall, very impressed!

This knife, was a great deal Friday and so happy I did! Excellently designed, very sharp. . Knife is well balanced, the handle for me is comfortable for me. For this price, would d do it again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the price this is a beautiful knife
reviews.reviewText: This knife looks and feels really amazing. It isn't the sharpest knife in the world, but with a little bit of sharpening I think it could be a near professional quality knife. For the price however I think it's unbeatable. It's not bulky like most other knives in this price range, and the design on the blade looks amazing. I think this would make a great addition to any kitchen, and also a really great gift for someone who likes to cook and could use a nicer knife. As someone who owns and frequently uses professional grade knives, this knife definitely seems like it's worth more than what it costs.
Se lo regalé a mi esposa y le encanto.Es un buen producto.
Wirkt am ersten Eindruck gut, sehr scharf. Preis-/Leistung sehr gut. Was will man für 20 Euro mehr?
Good well made quality knife. Very sharp and should give years of service. Came in nice packaging box with accompanying paperwork attesting to quality and workmanship.
Me gustó mucho, buen precio, excelente el filo y su apariencia muy bonita, sólo falta ver cuánto durará afilado, por lo pronto contento con mi compra ....
